title: Marcus Morris Sr. | New York Knicks | NBA.com
snippet: Morris will join the Knicks on a one-year deal, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

title: Marcus Morris Sr. - Wikipedia
snippet: On September 15, 2024, Morris re-signed with the New York Knicks, but was waived on September 28. Morris is seven minutes younger than his identical twin brother, Markieff. He is a fan of his hometown Philadelphia Eagles while Markieff roots for the rival Dallas Cowboys.

title: Marcus Morris Sr. News, Rumors, Updates - New York Knicks | FOX Sports
snippet: Let go by New York The Knicks waived Morris on Saturday, Tim Bontemps of ESPN.com reports. Impact Morris signed with the Knicks earlier this offseason but was let go before playing a single game. The 35-year-old forward will now enter the 2024-25 season as a free agent. ...
